title: Sonotoki wa Kare ni Yoroshiku
sinopse:
One night, the beautiful woman who owns the Aqua Plant Shop appeared before me. With the leaflet about looking for a part-time worker, in hand, I entered the shop.
"I shall inform you about your employment," she said. "Do you have any place to stay? Is it okay if you sleep here and stay?"
It was a chance encounter, they begin to love with each other, they think of each other, they continue to think of each other, and then they had to part ways...(Source: MU)
